title: Suzuki Motorcycle rolls out 6 millionth unit from Gurugram facility
description: "This year marks the completion of Suzuki Motorcycle India's 15 years in the country. It is indeed heartening to also announce the roll out of our six millionth Suzuki two-wheeler product in India from our Gurugram plant," Suzuki Motorcycle India Managing Director Satoshi Uchida said in a statement.
